author: pgoldstein
msg: Many changes to the NNTP server.
Corrected a number of outstanding bugs, including issues with command parsing,
NNTP authentication/authorization, and some group handling.
A number of issues may remain - a number of TODOs have been added to draw attention
Note that deployment of this distribution will require a change to the assembly.xml
as per the change to james-assembly.xml

author: pgoldstein
msg: Added a DEBUG value to some of the mailets, to control the logged strings for these mailets.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for the fix.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fix for parity bug in SMTP MAIL SIZE handling.
Added host, ip to all connection debug messages

author: pgoldstein
msg: Making RecipientIs and SenderIs agree in behavior.
